name: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Focus on the present moment, observing thoughts and sensations without judgment.

name: Loving-Kindness Meditation
description: Cultivate feelings of love and kindness towards oneself and others.

name: Transcendental Meditation
description: Use a mantra to transcend thought and experience a state of restful alertness.

name: Body Scan Meditation
description: Bring awareness to different parts of your body, noticing sensations without judgment.

name: Walking Meditation
description: Combine meditation with mindful walking, focusing on the sensations of movement.
techniques: Focus on footfalls and body sensations
